item.title: Democrats Who Pretend DOJ Weaponization Didn’t Happen Under Biden Get Schooled By Sen. Hawley
item.description: Democrat timing is disingenuous, coming a day after evidence that former President Joe Biden used the FBI to spy on Republicans senators.

item.title: No, Obamacare Premiums Are Not Doubling
item.description: Contrary to Marjorie Taylor Greene’s claim, most of the Obamacare subsidies are not expiring, for good or for ill.

item.title: Concordia University Wisconsin Gives Christian Colleges A Bad Name
item.description: In the wake of Charlie Kirk’s assassination, Concordia's first response was to prevent a TPUSA chapter from being recognized on campus.

item.title: How Many Of 300,000 Virginia Early Voters Want To Change Their Mind On Jay Jones But Can’t?
item.description: In addition to calling on Jay Jones to drop out, Democrats should also end the nonsense of a months-long 'election season.'

item.title: Reality Curb Stomps David French’s Psycho Fantasies — Again
item.description: To listen to The New York Times’ David French about Cracker Barrel, free speech, Christians, or anything at all is to abuse your own mind.
